name: Colourizz: Drifting
description:
Welcome to GridEyePIX's page!

Super easy to control and fun to play this little minimalist car game! Try to get as close as you can to the yellow dots to get more score!

Control this game using mouse clicks or touches!

If you want to know more visit grideyepix.com website !

Make sure you comment your(real) best score ;) !

Enjoy and Have fun! :)
